page.title: 13LOCAL GOVERNMENT
page.content: At{County level}the whole of this area is served by one councillor on the{Wiltshire County Council representing the Lacock and Pewsham area.The present councillor is a Conservative. At{District level}95% of the area is served by the{North Wilts District council based in Chippenham whilst the remaining 5% is served by the{Kennet {District council}in Devizes. Two councillors sit for the area on the N.W. Council a Conservative and a Liberal. At{Parish level}there are three councils. These are{Lacock, Pewsham and{Bromham.}None of these councils are contested on party lines.
